attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i have been watching the news, i appreciate that the world economy is in meltdown, but i totally disagree with what has been said by the government, why should we bailout local authorities who have put our monies in to foriegn banks, we already pay too much council tax for a very shoddy service and there is no way we should be asked to pay extra.

reasons: The names of individuals, or information where they may be identified, in relation to criminal accusations
